title: Diamond and Emerald Vaddanam: The "Haritha Lakshmi"
materials: G-H color). Features high-quality Zambian Emeralds
complemented by carved emerald drops. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Intricate floral and paisley motifs handcrafted in a closed setting. Central Emerald is surrounded by a cluster of diamonds. The cascading emerald drops provide a graceful sway. The band features a geometric, chevron pattern, ensuring flexibility and comfort. Incorporates traditional Telugu design elements with a modern setting style.
colors: Predominantly a sparkling white (diamonds) and vibrant green (emeralds) with a warm yellow gold undertone. This classic combination symbolizes prosperity and growth.
occasions: upscale parties and celebrations. A statement piece for a bride's Voni function or a grand reception. Suitable for both traditional South Indian attire and elegant contemporary outfits.
description: This Vaddanam is a testament to Hyderabadi craftsmanship and reflects the rich cultural heritage of South India. The use of high-quality diamonds and vibrant Zambian emeralds makes it a valuable investment. Its unique design blends tradition with a modern aesthetic, making it a timeless piece that can be passed down through generations. The emeralds symbolize prosperity and good health, adding auspiciousness to any occasion.
